description: video elements are artifacted a bit, and desktop/window sharing doesn't work, but if you just need something for basic chat/file sharing and calling without anything beyond talking to someone this is great!
It works like a charm on Ubuntu 22.10
great app it really is something

It is a great alternative for a native MS teams version that does not have any backgroud effects for camera (which is very important for me), but the screensharing does not work for ubuntu 22.04 with wayland enabled, so the only way to be able to use screen sharing is to disable the wayland, which is not the best option I think :(
Very securable APP

I installed this app just before a meeting. Its initial startup time sucks but after login it has the familiar interface and worked with no issues in terms of functionality.
While screen sharing, I did notice that my laptop heated up a bit more than usual. Something the developers want to look into.
Working very fine as expacted

After installing this one and launching it and logging in with your microsoft login details, it is telling you that you can either download Teams for Linux or use the web version. So this version does nothing!
Great application - thanks!

Just use this command to enable the Camera:

sudo snap connect teams-for-linux:camera

https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/blob/develop/KNOWN_ISSUES.md
summary: If you had issues with the Camera please enable it according to doc

Today i was able to use and it has a nice overview and is very nice. I wanted to be using the account synchronization of a lot of accounts but i can't use this or wasn't aware how to do it. The chat seems to function well. I'm afraid to have my account hacked because i don't see how it's used the manipulation of the browser since i only see the app opened, the program is good to use and the software shop classified it as secured. I would recommend but i have to use it to an interview this week. Thanks for the dev to make this great option.
Thanks for making this! The official app is literally trash...
Absolute rubbish. Tried to test microphone locked program Had to remove and install. Life is too short for this rubbish.
video call not working

Hello, Thank you for creating this app. It is very nice app. I would recommend that it need to open window when I press favourite apps shortkey (super + #(number of location in favourite apps)) while running in background mode(the icon that displayed in status bar). Also, It needs to open when pressing on icon in status bar by double click.
the app is great. From the second i opend it i could not tell it was thrid party and it runs great
Audio, video and Desktop sharing all work!
Expected much less from a third party app. But this works really well. All features work.
Able to finally join meetings and screen share.
Many thanks! Now i'm able to share my screen!
I was using the Web client in a Firefox window, and while this is basically the same thing, it works very well and allows me a dedicated app for Teams.
Smooth and fast!
summary: Great app. Just like the Windows 10 version!

description: Switching between convos is way faster than in the MS Teams Capsule appimage. OTOH typing is for some weird reason very laggy. The only way I can get it working is to uninstall and install after i close the application each time.
summary: Great, but stopped working after last update

description: Stuck on Initializing when opening. No further progression.
I only can connect and make it working once, after what i have to reinstall the app to be able to make it working again
Teams is not working from last two days. It is just showing tray again or signout. but nothing happens if I do
I only use the Teams app for the chat functionality, but it works great.
App is good enough. Problem is that sometimes it stops working and you have to reinstall it. It often happens after letting the PC idle, or closing the laptop for a while
thanks for the app
I can login for first time but the second time it will freeze

Every time I exit out of teams-for-linux and try to start it back to log back in later it gets stuck on a white screen with the title "Initializing". Refreshing, logging out, and even killing the app completely to start fresh does nothing. The only thing that works is uninstalling and reinstalling the snap. I think there may be a cache that get stuck somewhere, but I have been unable to locate it.
Finally, a way to properly use MS Teams on linux without the hassle of creating fake browser agents! Thank you!

Presumably working well. However, video chat and screen sharing don't work, since the app isn't based on edge/IE. That's not really the fault of this app (or it's dev) though.

Maybe this will change, once edge has been migrated to the new Chromium base
summary: Nice, but no benefits over browser version apart from separation

description:
It often seems to fail and just show a white screen after ADFS login. This can be resolved by clearing the app cache but after using it for a few days, I've found this is required every login.
I'm removing it and going back to using a browser window until future bug fixes

description: I get only a message that a problem occured during login. It shows a Button "try again" but this isn't working. Have to go back to Browser... :-(

Um die Informationen von meinen Teammitgliedern zu bekommen, ist das Tool bestens geeignet. Wie es mit der Bearbeitung von Dateien aussieht kann ich noch nicht wirklich beurteilen.
The app use a DNS-record on your home page. Microsoft use this as company identifyer. During the registration you get it from microsoft. The TXT record looks like 'MS=ms12345678'.
summary: Thank you! It works with ms-registration

description: Die Anwendung startet um einen darauf hinzuzweisen man solle die Anwendung, in welcher man sich gerade befindet, bitte installieren.

Wie in den anderen Rezensionen schon anklingt, ist das ganze Installationsverfahren typisch Windoof-kompliziert, aber wenn man sich nur lang genug durchklickt bis zur Linux-Desktop-App (nicht die Web-App!), kann man irgendwann eine DEB-Version herunterladen...
Die Installation schlägt immer fehl.

Heute hatte ich zum ersten mal von daheim aus eine Online Schulung. 
Da unsere Firma alles auf Microsoft Teams macht, musst ich diese App runterladen und war bisschen verunsichert durch die Kommentare. 
Also bei mir lief die ganze Stunde alles reibungslos. Installation war relativ einfach.
Die Zusammenfassung spricht für sich
Jedoch sollte man sich im klaren sein ein unoffizielles Programm herunterlädt , weshalb ich einfach das orginalprogramm von Misrosoft heruntertladen Würde (neue Linux version vorhanden)

Wie gesagt. Läuft fast immer gut (hatte nur einmal ein Problem von alleine ohne extraeinladung in die Konferenz zu kommen). Jeoch gerade entdeckt, dass des via Chrome läuft...hmpf
Und immer Probleme beim Wechseln zwischen Hauptbesprechungen und Breakout rooms.
summary: Läuft gut. Läuft via Web mit Google Chrome!

description:
Hatte Teams Preview, jedoch funzt das seit heute nicht mehr. Also habe ich Teams heruntergeladen, geht alles.
Was ist denn der Unterschied zwischen Teams, Teams Preview und Teams Insiders ?
das Programm leuft extrem langsam braucht ewig zum laden und stürtzt oft ab also weg damit
Nutze das Snap schon seit geraumer Zeit für Onlinewebinare mit unterschiedlichen Anforderungen von der Dozentenseite aus und habe bisher mit meinem betagten Lappi keine Probleme!
Nun ist es an Microsoft endlich alle Features inklusive des Hintergrundwechsels der Kamera auch in der WebApp zu implementieren.
summary: Nicht nützlich aber eine gute Idee

description: Asks for registration and redirects to Web. Not working as stand alone with Ununtu.

Ich benutze es beruflich im home office seit zwei Jahren und kann feststellen, dass all das was ich brauche auch funktioniert.
Ich verwende es in Zusammenarbeit mit OBS Studio um den Hintergrund mit der virtuellen Kamerafunktion sauber freizustellen.
Die Preview von Microsoft war praktisch unbenutzbar. Jetzt kann ich endlich alle Teams-Funktionen nutzen und muss nicht mehr minutenlang auf den Programmstart warten.
summary: Endlich funktioniert Teams auch unter Linux zufriedenstellend

description: Obwohl ich alle Berechtigungen erteilt hatte, hat das Programm nicht auf Kamera und Mikrofon zugegriffen (swohl Laptop Mikro als auch externes). Die Kammera- und Mikrofoneinstellungen im Programm wurden nicht angezeigt. Die anderen Teilnehmer konnte ich sehen und hören.

description: nice and stable
que puedo hacer para que me funcione en ubuntu 20.04 LTS
no me funciona en Ubuntu 20.04 LTS

En Ubuntu la aplicación funciona bastante mal, tiene cantidad grande de detalles y problemas. Algunos son: Al compartir pantalla no permite elegir una ventana, sino todo lo que uno está viendo. Al compartir una imagen en un chat, muchas veces se muestra un recuadro sin la imagen. No es posible minimizar al mínimo la ventana cuando uno comparte pantalla. Aparecen errores de funcionamiento al compartir pantalla. No suelo hacer reseñas, pero esta aplicación está tan mal que me pareció bien tomarme el tiempo para ver si en algún momento la mejoran.
instalado en ubuntu 20.04 y trabajando con total normalidad todas las funcionalidades

yo soy usuario de ubuntu 18.04 y al principio compartir pantalla, a parte de no dejarte elegir la pantalla, que entre comillas no era nada demasiado problematico, funcionaba. Ahora no funciona, cuando inicias el compartir pantalla, se inicia el proceso y tal y segun el programa la estas compartiendo pero para los que observan lo ven todo en negro y ademas sale un mensaje en el discord de que estoy en modo no molestar que no se si tendra algo que ver pero no me encuentro en ese estado. a ver si lo corrigen porque ahora mismo es la parte mas util para mi ya que trabajo compartiendo la pantalla para muchas cosas.

A principios de curso (setiembre 2020) dejó de funcionar la posibilidad de compartir la pantalla o alguna ventana, por lo que tuve que empezar a usar el cliente oficial de Microsoft. Ahora (febrero 2021) funcionar de nuevo por lo que he vuelto a usar esta versión, que precedió a la oficial, tiene el código fuente abierto en Github y no se abre automáticamente al entrar en el sistema operativo (si la dejaste cerrada al salir). Solamente permite visualizar otro asistente; el oficial permite ver cuatro cámaras ajenas. Muchas gracias a Ismael Martínez por este cliente.
summary: vuelve a funcionar el compartimiento de pantalla

description: Me gusto mucho

Some comments say that the application keeps asking for installation whereas the app is already installed. The solution is to register to Microsoft Teams: go to the following page and choose "For business", then set up the account.

https://products.office.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/free?&OCID=AID2000628_SEM_0eAaOTGO&MarinID=0eAaOTGO|79645986309572|microsoft%20teams%20free|be|c||1274334235465277|kwd-79646055530279:loc-190&lnkd=Bing_Teams_Brand&msclkid=1f96ab7481c1154bb71bf69a18ff264b

description:
Устанавливал в июле - работала. Теперь виснет на инициализации, вероятно после очередного обновления Ubuntu. 
Ещё была проблема с демонстрацией экрана, несколько секунд работает, а потом у других видна зависшая картинка.
Всякие мелочи по типу изменить аватар профиля или канала не работают почему-то
После обновления системы, не демонтрируется экран, висит черная картинка у тех кому экран надо показать, с моей стороны я вижу что демонстрация идет
Работает лучше проприетарного клиента. Нет некоторых не критичных вещей, но я их и не использовал.
Единственно нормальный работающий клиент Teams - родной постоянно расконнекчивает.. и показывает хвосты от Skype
второй раз уже не открывается))) пришлось переустанавливать
